full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
**Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice**

**Request for Proposal Title:** Procurement of Intermediate Procurement Specialist Services

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017341

**Publication Date:** 2022-12-15

**Closing Date:** 2023-01-23T13:00:00

**Amendment Date:** 2023-01-12

**Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Region of Opportunity:** World

**Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Contract Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to establish a contract for the services of One (1) Intermediate Procurement Specialist. The contract term will be for three (3) years, with the option to extend for up to two (2) one-year irrevocable option periods. 

The purpose of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to establish a contract for the delivery of Intermediate Procurement Specialist services. The supplier must provide the required services to support the DND's procurement needs.

**Eligibility:**

The RFP is open to the below list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Service (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.

**Document and Contract Requirements:**

The documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the pre-qualified suppliers who are invited to bid on this requirement. The RFP documents are only available through electronic email from the Contracting Authority.

**Security Requirements:**

The successful contractor will require a Secret security clearance and must comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

**Instructions to Bidders:**

Bidders are to provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation to ensure that their bid is compliant with the Treasury Board policies and directives.

**Inquiries:**

Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, David Puff at david.puff@forces.gc.ca.

---

**Note:** All details have been extracted from the original document. However, for brevity and clarity, some information has been omitted or paraphrased, while ensuring context is preserved.
